verbs.description: A former Trump campaign chairman , Paul Manafort , [V: was] sent to jail on Friday after a court appearance in connection with the Russia probe .
[ARG1: A former Trump campaign chairman , Paul Manafort ,] was [V: sent] [ARG2: to jail] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-TMP: after a court appearance in connection with the Russia probe] .
